cmipaccess.local.cell_files module

cmipaccess.local.cell_files.download_cell_file(model, variable, grid, generation='CMIP6', overwrite=False, source='esgf', **kwargs)[source]

Download the file for cell area size

Parameters:

  • model (str) – _description_

  • variable (str) – _description_

  • grid (str) – _description_

  • generation (str, optional) – Generation of the models. For now only works with CMIP6 data. Defaults to ‘CMIP6’.

  • overwrite (bool, optional) – if True overwrites an existing file. Defaults to False.

Opens a dataset containing cell area data for a given model and grid

Parameters:

  • variable (_type_) – _description_

  • grid (_type_) – _description_

  • generation (str, optional) – _description_. Defaults to ‘CMIP6’.

_description_

_type_

cmipaccess.local.config module

Defines the path where you want global mean timeseries to be stored

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access module

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_all_detrended_global_time_series(model, experiment, variable, no_parent=False, remove_if_control_less_than='max', warn_too_short_control=False, convert_time_to_datetime=True, progress=True, **kwargs)[source]

Returns all global mean time series for a given experiment, model and variable. The time series are corrected for control experiment drift.

Parameters:

  • model (str) – Climate model

  • experiment (str) – experiment

  • variable (str) – variable name

  • no_parent (bool, optional) – Specify if the experiment has no parent (required for amip experiments). Defaults to False.

  • remove_if_control_less_than (str or int, optional) – does not load timeseries if parrallel control run is shorter than this value. Defaults to ‘max’.

  • warn_too_short_control (bool, optional) – Prints warning when control experiment is too short. Defaults to False.

  • convert_time_to_datetime (bool, optional) – Converts cftime read with xarray to pandas datetime. Defaults to True.

  • progress (bool, optional) – Shows a progressbar for all realisations. Defaults to True.

Raises:

ValueError – Raises an error when the timeseries have not been downloaded yet

Returns:

dataset containing the global timeseries for all realisations with the control drift removed, along with the mean control value and the number of years of control run parallel to the experiment.

Return type:

xr.Dataset

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_all_detrended_global_time_series_multivariable(model, experiment, *variables, no_parent=False, remove_if_control_less_than='max', warn_too_short_control=False, progress=True, add_control_mean=False, convert_time_to_datetime=True, **kwargs)[source]

Return detrended time series of multiple variables

Parameters:

  • model (str) – Climate model name

  • experiment (str) – Experiment id

  • variables (str) – variable names

  • no_parent (bool, optional) – Specify if the experiment has no parent experiment, required for amip-style experiments. Defaults to False.

  • remove_if_control_less_than (str or int, optional) – does not load timeseries if parrallel control run is shorter than this value. Defaults to ‘max’.

  • warn_too_short_control (bool, optional) – Prints warning when control experiment is too short. Defaults to False.

  • convert_time_to_datetime (bool, optional) – Converts cftime read with xarray to pandas datetime. Defaults to True.

  • progress (bool, optional) – Shows a progressbar for all realisations. Defaults to True.

  • add_control_mean (bool, optional) – Adds control mean to global time series to only have the trend removed. Defaults to False.

Returns:

dataset containing multiple global mean variables with the control drift removed

Return type:

xr.Dataset

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_detrended_global_time_series(model, experiment, realisation, variable, **kwargs)[source]

Return the global time series of a variable with the control experiment drift removed. The drift is computed as a linear trend in time of the control experiment parallel to the experiment.

Parameters:

  • model (str) – Climate model name

  • experiment (str) – Experiment id

  • variable (str) – Variable id

  • realisation (str) – member id

Returns:

dataset containing the global timeseries with the control drift removed, along with the mean control value and the number of years of control run parallel to the experiment.

Return type:

xr.Dataset

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_global_time_series(model, experiment, realisation, variable, **kwargs)[source]

Return an xarray Dataset containing a global mean time series of the variable required.

Parameters:

  • model (str) – Climate model

  • experiment (str) – Experiment id

  • variable (str) – variable name

  • realisation (str) – member id

Raises:

ValueError – An error is raised if the global mean data is not found on spiritX.

Returns:

Dataset containing the variable as a global time series.

Return type:

xarray.Dataset

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_global_toa_energy_budget(model, experiment, no_parent=False, remove_if_control_less_than='max', warn_too_short_control=False, convert_time_to_datetime=True, progress=True, add_control_mean=False, **kwargs)[source]

Load global mean time series of tas, rsut, rlut, rsdt and eei for the given model and experiment. Time series are by default detrended by the control experiment.

Parameters:

  • model (str) – Climate model name

  • experiment (str) – Experiment id

  • no_parent (bool, optional) – Specify if the experiment has no parent experiment, required for amip-style experiments. Defaults to False.

  • remove_if_control_less_than (str or int, optional) – does not load timeseries if parrallel control run is shorter than this value. Defaults to ‘max’.

  • warn_too_short_control (bool, optional) – Prints warning when control experiment is too short. Defaults to False.

  • convert_time_to_datetime (bool, optional) – Converts cftime read with xarray to pandas datetime. Defaults to True.

  • progress (bool, optional) – Shows a progressbar for all realisations. Defaults to True.

  • add_control_mean (bool, optional) – Adds control mean to global time series to only have the trend removed. Defaults to False.

Returns:

dataset containing the main toa radiation budget variables with the piControl trend removed

Return type:

xr.Dataset

cmipaccess.local.global_data_download module

cmipaccess.local.global_data_download.download_all_realisations_all_models(experiment, *variables, grid=None, freq='mon', source='spiritx', esgf_fallback=True, generation='CMIP6', overwrite=False, area_path=None, **kwargs)[source]

Downloads global time series for all models and all experiments available for a given experiment

Parameters:

  • experiment (_type_) – _description_

  • grid (_type_, optional) – _description_. Defaults to None.

  • freq (str, optional) – _description_. Defaults to ‘mon’.

  • source (str, optional) – _description_. Defaults to ‘spiritx’.

  • esgf_fallback (bool, optional) – _description_. Defaults to True.

  • generation (str, optional) – _description_. Defaults to ‘CMIP6’.

  • overwrite (bool, optional) – _description_. Defaults to False.

  • area_path (_type_, optional) – _description_. Defaults to None.

cmipaccess.local.global_data_download.download_all_realisations_one_model(model, experiment, *variables, grid=None, freq='mon', source='spiritx', esgf_fallback=True, generation='CMIP6', overwrite=False, area_path=None, **kwargs)[source]

  • overwrite (bool, optional) – _description_. Defaults to False.
